string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Allow access to your device\'s camera to take photos and videos within the app.
This app requires Read Contacts permission to access your contacts for easy communication.
This app requires Record Audio permission to enable voice-based features for better interaction.
This app requires Fine Location permission to provide accurate location-based services.
This app requires Coarse Location permission to offer location-based features with approximate location.
This app requires access your SMS messages to provide you with relevant app features or services.
Allow the app to send SMS messages on your behalf for convenient communication.
Allow the app to receive and process incoming SMS messages for enhanced app functionality.
Enable the app to initiate phone calls directly from within the app.
This app requires access your device\'s calendar to offer scheduling and reminder features.
Grant permission to add, modify, or delete events in your device\'s calendar for better scheduling and organization.
This app requires access your device\'s phone state information for improved app performance and to provide personalized features.
Grant permission to access your device\'s accounts to enhance app integration and provide a seamless experience.
Grant permission to modify and add contacts directly from the app for a more streamlined contact management experience.
